original_text: They will stumble over one another as though fleeing from the sword, even though no one is pursuing them. So you will not be able to stand before your enemies.
korean_text: 그들은 쫓는 자가 없어도 칼 앞에 있음 같이 서로 짓밟혀 넘어지리니 너희가 원수들을 맞설 힘이 없을 것이요

sentences.original_text: They will stumble over one another
as though fleeing from the sword
even though no one is pursuing them
So you will not be able to stand
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너는 설 수 없을 것입니다
